ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of celery soup
1 (4 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as RitzÂ®), crushed
des: "I've been making this recipe for over 30 years, and it's always a hit. My husband likes it so much we call it 'Jim's Casserole' at our house. It's a great alternative to green bean casserole at Thanksgiving."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix green beans, celery soup, sour cream, shoepeg corn, Cheddar cheese, water chestnuts, and lemon juice together in a bowl; spread into a casserole dish.
Mix crackers and butter together in a bowl; sprinkle over the casserole.
Bake in preheated oven until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
